name: CreateProductFreshservice
description:
Create a new product in the Freshservice catalog.

This tool is used to create and add a new product to the Freshservice Product Catalog. It should be called when you need to introduce a new product into the system.

parameters.name: product_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the product to be created in the Freshservice catalog. Must be an integer.

parameters.name: product_name
parameters.description: The name of the product to be created in the Freshservice catalog.

parameters.name: product_asset_type_id
parameters.description: Integer ID representing the asset type of the product, used to categorize the product in the catalog.

value_schema.description: Asset Type id of the Product

parameters.name: manufacturer_name
parameters.description: Name of the product manufacturer. This is free text and can contain any valid manufacturer name.

parameters.name: product_status
parameters.description: The product status: `1` for In Production, `2` for In Pipeline, `3` for Retired.

value_schema.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

parameters.name: procurement_mode
parameters.description: Mode of procurement for the product: `1` for Buy, `2` for Lease, `3` for Both.

value_schema.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

parameters.name: depreciation_type_identifier
parameters.description: Unique integer identifier for the type of depreciation applicable to the product. This should match the internal categorization used by Freshservice for depreciation types.

parameters.name: depreciation_type_id_code
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used for the product.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: asset_type_id
parameters.description: Asset Type id of the Product

value_schema.description: Asset Type id of the Product

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

value_schema.description:
status can be
  `1` - In Production
  `2` - In Pipeline
  `3` - Retired

parameters.name: mode_of_procurement_id
parameters.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

value_schema.description:
mode of procurement can be
  `1` - Buy
  `2` - Lease
  `3` - Both

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the depreciation type used
